name: Beauty hair salon management
description:
Get your entire customer pleased by giving them a beauty haircut or hair wash in this hair salon girl game. You get to try out different style and with spot-on management you will be rewarded with gold coins for your income, make sure you will be able to meet the goal for each game. Style the customer so they are happy and beautiful!

Features
• Customer will come a haircut or hair wash
• Place them to the right colored chair with the choice they want
• Customer will choose the length of cut for their hair.
• If you get the wrong cut, you will lose the customer.
• Serve them right and you will get your tip to reach your goal.
